name: StarNinja vs SpaceHydra
description:
GAMEPAD SUPPORTED (but keyboard works just as well)

Avoid, shoot and reflect bullets into the SpaceHydras 3 heads

Use Z or up arrow to:
jump
double jump
hover (hold)

use X or spacebar to:
Shoot
reflect (when a bullet is in front of you)

Bullets move up ranks when they are reflected. Do not get in the way of a bullet that is a higher rank than you. Reflect anything else.
Hydra heads will reflect anything that is a lower rank than them too.

I strongly recommend that you read the 'HOW TO PLAY & CONTROLS' included with every copy.
